      • aggregateServicingList

        private void aggregateServicingList​(int eleNum,
                                    int currentFloor)
        Depending on the current movement of the elevator and the floor that it resides on, 3 LinkedLists will be added to. The first will take all elevator buttons pushed and all lobby call floors on the current floor and the floors to come in its direction. The second will take all the the lobby call floors going in the opposite direction. And the third will take all of the lobby call floors going in the same direction but preceding the current floor.

        Each of these LinkedLists are added to in an ascending of descending fashion, depending on the current direction.

        Parameters:
        eleNum - number of the Elevator object
        currentFloor - current floor the Elevator object is on

      • getWaitingAreaAndElevatorButtons

        private void getWaitingAreaAndElevatorButtons​(com.nodalexchange.elevator.Building building)
        Puts lobby button data into boolean[] and grabs essential Elevator data.
        Parameters:
        building - Building object that holds the data for the lobby call buttons

      • evaluateAndMove

        private void evaluateAndMove​(com.nodalexchange.elevator.Elevator elevator,
                             int elevatorNumber,
                             int currentFloor,
                             MyElevatorController.ElevatorState currentMovementState)
        Handles elevator movement of given elevator parameter by setting new instructions. Will check up to three of the given LinkedLists and based on the one it grabs data from the elevator will move in that style.

        The elevator wants to move in its current direction until empty, stopping to let people off or to pick up people wanting to go in the same direction.

        Parameters:
        elevator - Elevator object to be given new instruction
        elevatorNumber - Elevator object's assigned integer id
        currentFloor - resident floor of Elevator object
        currentMovementState - ElevatorState enum designating current movement state

      • cycleElapsed

        public void cycleElapsed​(com.nodalexchange.elevator.Building building)
        Gets called in SystemLauncher.java after elevator has moved or is loading.

        During only the first call all of the private globals are initialized/instantiated to the appropriate sizes and values. Every other time getWaitingAreaAndElevatorButtons() gets called.

        Specified by:
        cycleElapsed in interface com.nodalexchange.elevator.ElevatorController
        Parameters:
        building - Building object that the cycle is being evaluated on
